sentences.chinese: “沒錯，”默多克說，又緊了緊浴袍。

sentences.english: Wearing the bath gown, our baby looked much more cuter, right?
sentences.chinese: 我們寶寶穿上浴袍，看上去更加可愛，對麼？

sentences.english: Locked up here on the penthouse floor, wearing a white terry-cloth bathrobe all day, counting his money, and talking on the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 關在頂樓，整天穿着毛巾布浴袍，數錢，打電話。

sentences.english: My robe is made of cotton.
He huddled on his robe and ran into the room to answer the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 他匆忙穿上浴袍，跑進屋內去接電話。

sentences.english: WHEN I GET to the Regent Hotel, Marla's in the lobby wearing a bathrobe.
sentences.chinese: 我趕到麗晶酒店的時候馬拉穿着浴袍。

sentences.english: Quilt Covers, Beachtowels, Bathrobes , Decoration Cushions, Carpets. Towels.
sentences.chinese: 採購產品製成棉被掩護，浴袍，裝飾墊子，地毯。

sentences.english: An oversize man's button-down shirt can be worn as both a cover - up and a bathrobe.
sentences.chinese: 男式係扣襯衣既可用來覆蓋身體又可當做浴袍。

sentences.english: Forgive me. My shabby clothes have soiled the Empress' bathrobe.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我這黑不溜秋的身子，弄髒了母后的浴袍。

sentences.english: Get yourself a luscious bathrobe that makes you feel like a queen.
sentences.chinese: 給自己找一件性感迷人的浴袍，讓你感覺像一個女王。

sentences.english: Mei Ling sat next to him, her robe open, showing that she now had her legs crossed.
sentences.chinese: 美玲坐在他身側，敞開的浴袍，露出她交迭的雙腳。

sentences.english: This luxurious black, men's dressing gown features a huge embroidered logo on the back!
sentences.chinese: 背部的大片刺繡是這件華麗的男士浴袍的最大特點。
